bilingual.source: The phone is connected to the charger.
Each node is connected to other nodes.
bilingual.target: 每个节点都连接到其他节点。

bilingual.source: The game console was connected to the TV.
bilingual.target: 游戏控制台连接到了电视。

bilingual.source: Please ensure the lead is connected correctly.
These two batteries are connected in parallel.
He connected the two batteries with a wire.
bilingual.target: 他用电线连接了两个电池。

bilingual.source: Make sure the accumulator is properly connected.
The speaker is connected to the audio system.
bilingual.target: 扬声器连接在音响系统上。

bilingual.source: This speaker is connected to my computer.
bilingual.target: 这个音箱连接到我的电脑上了。

bilingual.source: Please ensure the capacitor is connected properly.
bilingual.target: 请确保电容器正确连接。

list.abstract: 《Connected》是滨崎步 (浜崎あゆみ)演唱的日语流行歌曲，Ferry Corsten作词作曲，由爱贝克思唱片公司发行于2002年1月1日，收录于专辑《I am...》中。
《CONNECTED...》是押井守担任总监督及原案的短片动画。讲述了在未来都市的女高中生的未知经历。

yingyinNormal.en: And this is what happened when interstate 30 connected it to nearby Dallas and Fort Worth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是在30号洲际公路连接达拉斯和沃斯堡附近时发生的事。

yingyinNormal.en: Hermes has 4 redundant flight computers, each connected to 3 redundant comm systems.
yingyinNormal.zh: 赫尔墨斯号有4个多余的飞行用电脑，每一个都连接着3个通讯系统。

yingyinNormal.en: Also, here's what you're going to do, Philippe. You're going to wear a safety belt underneath your costume, attached to a safety line connected to a carabiner.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有，你还得做一件事，菲利浦，在衣服底下你得系上安全带，接上安全索，再连接到扣环。

yingyinNormal.en: A thousand horizontal wells have been sunk into the earth and then connected by canals over 3,000 miles in length, directing water from the Tian Shan mountain glaciers 100 miles to the north, to their fields and villages.
yingyinNormal.zh: 数千个深入大地中的水平井，而后由长度唱过三千英里的运河连接，将一百六十公里外的天山冰川融水引入她们的田野与村庄。

yingyinNormal.en: You're saying these accidents are somehow connected.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是说这些事故之间有着某种联系。

yingyinNormal.en: I can see a lot of you connected to it as well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可见，你们很多人也都读过这本书。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: And so we are all connected in the great circle of life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，在这个生命圈里面，都是互相有关联的。

yingyinNormal.en: And I'm so grateful that so many women around the world connected to it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 世界上很多女性都同它产生了共鸣，这让我很欣慰。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: So, what if this whole chunk of land is connected to our tectonic plate?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，要是，要是这一大片土地都与地壳板块相连呢？

yingyinNormal.en: When they shut down the airports, our connecting flight never connected.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们关闭了机场 我们的转接航班再也没出现

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, I walked her home, and it was amazing how much we connected, you know?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我陪她走回家，我们之间心有灵犀。

yingyinNormal.en: He ordered existing and scattered fortifications to be connected into one Great Wall.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他下令将现存的和佚散的防御工事连为一体成为长城。

yingyinNormal.en: It's all connected. The turtles are the vigilantes and the vigilantes are these turtles.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些都能连起来，这些乌龟就是义警，义警也就是这些乌龟。

yingyinNormal.en: The future world, we believe we'll be connected not by oil, not by other things, but by datas(data).
yingyinNormal.zh: 未来的世界，我们将不再由石油驱动，而是由数据驱动。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I mean, I know you're pregnant. I just never connected the idea of pregnancy and you actually having a baby.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的意思是，我知道你怀孕了，只是我从来没把怀孕跟你要生孩子这件事联想到一起。

yingyinNormal.en: What are the odds that two individuals as unique as ourselves would be connected by someone as comparatively workaday as your son?
yingyinNormal.zh: 像我们这么独特的两个人通过像你儿子这样的庸人而联系上的几率有多大？

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Roja, who is intimately connected with Lemond Bishop, a top drug dealer. Just allow me to question Mr. Bishop. That's all I ask.
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗哈先生与大毒枭雷蒙德毕夏普私下有联系，请允许我询问毕夏普先生，我只有这一个请求。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know, I just thought you know that he'd feel more like a brother you know, like you and Ross, just like close and connected and....
yingyinNormal.zh: 我以为他会更有兄弟的感觉，就像你和罗斯，亲密融洽。

yingyinNormal.en: My father was so proud that I was even remotely connected to you guys. He used to call you the last line of defense. He was your top supporter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当年我只是远远地和你们搭上了点关系我父亲就很骄傲。他叫你们最后的防线。他是你们的头号支持者。

yingyinNormal.en: Indeed, I've been connected with his family since infancy. You may well be surprised, miss Elizabeth, especially given our cold greeting this afternoon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 实际上，我从小就和他家里有特别的关系。你下午也许看到我们见面时那种冷冰冰的样子了吧，难怪你听了我的话会诧异。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Helping you feel close and <highlight>connected</highlight> to people you care about.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 帮助你与你关心的人感到亲密和联结。

examination_example.sentence: It's that simple: Talking to strangers can make you feel <highlight>connected</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就这么简单：和陌生人交谈可以让你感到有联系。

examination_example.sentence: These purchases often become more valuable with time — as stories or memories — particularly if they involve feeling more <highlight>connected</highlight> to others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着时间的推移，这些购买通常会变得更有价值——作为故事或回忆——尤其是当它们涉及到与他人有更紧密联系的感觉时。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Unlike friendships that can fade or break, I know I'll always be <highlight>connected</highlight> to my mother no matter what I face.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不像友谊会褪色或破裂，我知道无论我面对什么，都会和我的母亲紧密相连。

examination_example.sentence: Some of your interests may not appear to be <highlight>connected</highlight> but, once you explore their depths, you discover that they are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的一些兴趣可能看起来并不相关，但一旦你深入探索，你会发现它们是相关的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Nature and culture are different but <highlight>connected</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自然和文化是不同的，但又是联系在一起的。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 连接, 联合, 联系
